metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39831 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.6.2. There is a heap-based buffer overflow at the function read_bytes_internal in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact. This issue is different from CVE-2018-20230.

criterions.comment: pspp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
